name: thingtalk
description: ThingTalk Just-In-Time Compiler, Library and Runtime
author: Stanford University Mobile and Social Computing Lab

scripts.compile-all-sentence-grammars: find ./languages/ -name \*.yasgg | while read name ; do echo $name ; output=$(dirname $name)/$(basename $name .yasgg).js ; node ./tools/meta-sentence-generator $name -o $output ; node -c $output ; done
scripts.update-po: for i in po/*.po ; do msgmerge -U $i po/${npm_package_name}.pot ; done
scripts.compile-mo: for i in po/*.po ; do msgfmt $i -o po/`basename $i .po`.mo ; done
scripts.prepare: yarn compile-mo && yarn regen-grammar && yarn regen-nn-grammar && yarn regen-meta-grammar && yarn compile-all-sentence-grammars
